snippet: For a broader appeal, the Easter concert at the Cathedral of St. Joseph in Hartford will feature an array of performers and draw from 400 years of works.
abstract: Easter concert at the Cathedral of St Joseph in Hartford will feature an array of performers and draw from 400 years of works, broadening its appeal (Metropolitan/Connecticut).
lead_paragraph: For a broader appeal, the Easter concert at the Cathedral of St. Joseph in Hartford will feature an array of performers and draw from 400 years of works.

headline.seo: A Preview of an Easter Concert at the Cathedral of St. Joseph
headline.main: Celebrating the Day With Musical Variety
headline.print_headline: Celebrating the Day With Musical Variety
